channel.title: Phaser 3 on Scott Westover
channel.description: Recent content in Phaser 3 on Scott Westover

item.title: Phaser 3 Inter Scene Communication Tutorial Video
item.description: If you are interested in learning how you can easily communicate between Scenes in Phaser 3 by using the Phaser 3 EventEmitter, then you should check out the third video in my new series that I released on YouTube: Phaser 3 Tutorial: Inter-Scene Communication Made Easy!. I hope you enjoy the new content! Please feel free to post any questions or comments below.

item.title: Creating a Zelda-Style Health Bar in Phaser 3 - Tutorial Video
item.description: If you are interested in learning how to create a simple health bar in Phaser 3 to look like the health bars from games like the Legend of Zelda!, then you should check out the third video in my new series that I released on YouTube: Creating a Zelda-Style Health Bar in Phaser 3 - Tutorial. I hope you enjoy the new content! Please feel free to post any questions or comments below.
